item.title: Create Your Easy Customizable Internal Issue Tracker With Refine and Supabase
item.description: This web application will us to create issue and tasks for your team members. You will also be able to choose the priority of these tasks, their tags, and which person to assign them to.

item.title: Create E-mail Subscription Panel with Refine and Strapi
item.description: We will make a web application that allows you to quickly create subscribers and send emails to your subscribers in a simple way. We’ll use refine to develop the frontend easily and strapi for backend solutions.

item.title: Migrating a React-Admin Application to Refine
item.description: Recently, our team decided to migrate a B2B admin panel of one of our customers from React-Admin to refine to battle test our new framework and improve our productivity.

item.title: Build Fast and Customizable Admin Panel with NestJS
item.description: We will prepare a simple `job-posting` application. We will also use the refine framework for the admin panel. The project will consist of two parts, api and admin.

item.title: Create a Feedback Admin panel in 15 Minutes with Refine and Strapi
item.description: We will quickly create an api with Strapi and then develop its frontend with refine. Thus, let's see how an admin panel can be created in a very short time with the perfect harmony of Strapi and refine.

item.title: Let's Build an App to Manage Your Hackathons with Refine
item.description: We'll be building a demo app to manage hackathons with refine.

item.title: Simple Web Application Example with Refine
item.description: Do you want to develop a web application quickly? You are at the right place!
